product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Top - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Offering just-right coverage for cold-weather running, the adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Top offers lightweight warmth with moisture-wicking fabric to keep you dry and comfy from start to finish. Soft, lightweight polyester fabric features Cocona(R) technology to speed moisture transfer and dry time. Cocona(R) fabrics are made with fibers from activated carbon from coconut shells salvaged from food and water filter industry waste. Built-in UPF 15 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Half-zip opening offers immediate ventilation when you need to cool off. adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Top features an athletic fit that hugs the body without being too tight. Overstock.
short_description: Offering just-right coverage for cold-weather running, the adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Top offers lightweight warmth with moisture-wicking fabric to keep you dry and comfy from start to finish.
